thread.section_title: Hotel Boutique At Grand Central - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A great stay
thread.title_full: A great stay - Review of Hotel Boutique At Grand Central, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: H1370NRpatrickg
title: A great stay
text: The hotel was good value and the staff very courteous and helpful. There were a lot of free benefits included such as free self service laundry room, boarding pass printing facilities, and free cash safe facilities. There was iced bottled water machine on most floors. The room was a little smaller than expected, but came with tv and microwave and coffee machine included and the room was excellent warm and clean with room cleaning service Excellent value
